5082 - Construction and Mining (Except Petroleum) Machinery and Equipment Summary > TAKRAF AUSTRALIA PTY. LTD. is an Australian proprietary company. Its operations cover construction and mining (except petroleum) machinery and equipment. The company is involved in the import and export of goods. TAKRAF AUSTRALIA PTY. LTD. is headquartered in Milton, Queensland. It is headed by managing director Ivan Agostini. For the 2024 financial year, the company reported revenue of $39.38 million. Its net loss totalled $3.74 million. TAKRAF AUSTRALIA PTY. LTD. forms part of the wholesale trade industry sector. Key Personnel > No key personnel were found for the selected company.
